name: Will (orhunygng, HeilHeisenberg)
description:
Will is a first-person role-playing game exploring the limitations we brought to our decisions and actions as a human being. We take actions with our will and what effects that is a wide spectrum. Factors like desires, culture, society, norms and “normal” gives us a perception of how we act and with courage and will these actions come to life.

 

Looking to your past can also show us the borders we draw to ourselves at all together. In this game, we’ll join Will for encouragement and realize the outlines all together.

 

The game is a product of GameJam.03 under the theme “Borders”.

 

Öz Başaranlar:

Alper Yasin Gürel

Orhun Yeğenağa
